title: Track Database
description: Implement SQLite database to track: processed songs, approval status, sync status. Avoid re-processing already handled tracks. Can be fully tested locally.

title: BlackHole loopback audio for Mac recording
description: Replace PulseAudio loopback (Linux-only) with BlackHole for Mac audio capture. BlackHole creates a virtual audio device that can route Spotify output to FFmpeg for recording. Need to: install BlackHole, configure multi-output device, capture audio stream during playback.
close_reason: BlackHole integration implemented as part of audio recording pipeline (media_server-czt)

title: Spotify API Integration
description: Implement Spotify liked songs monitor using spotipy. Poll for new liked songs added after November 2025. Fetch track metadata and cover art. Can be fully tested locally with Spotify Premium account.

title: Retry logic for failed operations
description: Add retry mechanism for transient failures. Tracks can get stuck in intermediate states (e.g. APPROVED but never RECORDED) if Spotify API fails, recording glitches, or network issues occur. Consider: exponential backoff, max retries, and a way to manually retry stuck tracks.

title: Metadata Tagging
description: Implement MP3 ID3 tag embedding using mutagen. Add artist, album, title, track number, and 640x640 cover art from Spotify API. Can be fully tested locally.

title: Main Orchestrator
description: Implement async Python orchestrator that coordinates all components: WiFi detection, Spotify polling, Discord approval flow, recording, and sync. Develop and test core logic locally.

title: PulseAudio Loopback on Pi
description: Configure PulseAudio loopback module on Pi for audio capture. Route spotifyd output to both speakers and recording sink. Adapt Mac audio pipeline code to use PulseAudio.

title: USB Sync Logic
description: Implement USB device detection and file sync. Detect mass storage devices, compare local library with device contents, copy new tracks. Can test on Mac with any USB drive.

title: WiFi detection reliability
description: WiFi detector returned None on macOS during testing. Need to verify it works reliably on both macOS (for dev) and Linux/Pi (for production). The airport command may not work on all Mac setups. Test on Pi with nmcli/iwgetid.

title: Remote Debugging Setup
description: Set up persistent SSH reverse tunnel using autossh. Install Claude Code CLI on Pi. Document access procedure for remote debugging sessions.

title: Car Installation
description: Install Pi in car. Mount in rugged case away from direct sun. Connect to cigarette lighter power. Real-world testing with phone hotspot and MP3 player.

title: Audio Recording Pipeline (Mac)
description: Implement audio capture and encoding on Mac for development. Use BlackHole or similar for loopback audio. Capture to WAV, encode to 192kbps MP3 via FFmpeg. This tests the core logic before porting to Pi/PulseAudio.
close_reason: Implemented audio recording pipeline with FFmpeg/BlackHole capture, silence detection, and MP3 encoding

title: spotifyd Setup on Pi
description: Install and configure spotifyd daemon on Raspberry Pi. Set up Spotify Connect authentication with refresh tokens. Verify playback works via the USB audio adapter.

title: Discord Bot
description: Implement Discord bot for notifications and approval workflow. Send 'found new song' messages, listen for yes/no responses, send completion confirmations. Handle pending approvals (persist across restarts). Can be fully tested locally.
close_reason: Implemented Discord bot with approval workflow, reaction support, and persistence across restarts

title: Local Development Setup
description: Set up Python virtual environment and install core dependencies (spotipy, discord.py, mutagen, ffmpeg) on Mac for local development and testing.

title: Integration Testing on Pi
description: End-to-end testing on Pi: add song → approve → record → sync. Test hotspot reconnection behavior. Test power interruption recovery.

title: Systemd Service Setup
description: Create systemd service for main orchestrator on Pi. Configure auto-start on boot, restart on failure.

title: Pi Hardware Setup
description: Flash Raspberry Pi OS Lite to SD card. Configure headless setup (SSH, WiFi). Install USB audio adapter and verify with aplay -l. Configure auto-connect to phone hotspot SSID. Test power from cigarette lighter adapter.
